title: Coffee Date
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/jayeverwoodartthing/moiraemerald]]

> So a while ago [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-first-ever-twin-site-secret-santa-gift-exchange I wrote a tale that features Director Fernsby and Director Reynolds] from the Twin Sites being besties, and well, I realised that their friendship is kinda odd to an outsider.
> This image can serve as a teaser for the Tale I'm writing about their first meeting - where Moira basically bullied Reynolds (with baked goods and pep) to be her friend, and took her out to coffee. I honestly love their friendship so much, and I'm glad Emerald has someone to bounce off her. Enjoy! 
> 
> Also, check out my [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Author Page!] There's more character stories there, and you can see some more of my art <3
author: Dr Vikki Lost
